categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Galaxies

nodes.text: Charde was a male politician who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Charde hired the male Nikto bounty hunter named Soris with assassinating his political rival, a male Otolla Gungan named Nalskel, of the Imperial administration. However, Nalskel hired another bounty hunter, who succeeded in both killing Soris and Charde.

Charde is listed as a non-player character in the directory tree files for the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
